entry.tran: 拆除（爆炸装置);解除（警报);使无效
entry.def: If someone deactivates an explosive device or an alarm, they make it harmless or impossible to operate.

example.ex: Russia is deactivating some of its deadliest missiles.
example.tran: 俄罗斯正在拆除其一些最危险的导弹。

means.word_mean: 1. remove from active military status or reassign;

sentences.sentence: "The men were deactivated after five years of service"
